Idea Description: An integrated, secure IoT solution enabling remote control of home lighting, temperature, and door locks via a mobile app. Features include motion sensors for intrusion alerts and energy usage monitoring to optimize efficiency.
Team Members and Roles: DIYA SAHA, UJJAINI GHOSH, SABARNI GAYEN, PREETY DATTA

Idea Description: Our team will create a device that can detect all kinds of mineral nutrients present in the soil along with moisture, pH and can also detect the temperature. Based on these data our device will give output whether a particular crop(farmer will give this as input) can be grown in the particular land or not and if not what it is lacking. It will also suggest which crops can grow well in that particular field and other details to the farmer like how much pesticide and water needed for that particular crop to grow.
Team Members and Roles: Subham Garai, Utsab Kundu, Sk. Riaz Uddin, Sanjh Dey Sarakar

Idea Description: The Smart E-Bike is a prototype of an electric bicycle featuring a GPS-based anti-theft system, a display for real-time battery and speed monitoring, and regenerative braking to maximize efficiency. It's designed to be a secure, eco-friendly, and convenient urban transportation solution.
Team Members and Roles: Archie Arya, Jashdeep Naskar, Rakshanda Shamin, Soumyasis Mishra, Sandipto Das

Idea Title: Alcohol Sensing Alert With Engine Locking System
Idea Description: This system utilizes a range of components including alcohol sensors, GPS, LCD display, and engine lock mechanisms to create a comprehensive alcohol detection and immobilization system for vehicles. It offers real-time monitoring, immediate alerts, and engine locking features to prevent drunk driving incidents. With a user-friendly interface and tamper-resistant design, it ensures compliance with regulations while enhancing safety on the roads.
Team Members and Roles: PRAMANGSHU DAS, Rani Bhattacharya, Stuti Biswas, Adwitiya Santra

Idea Description: This IoT solution deploys ultrasonic sensors in trash bins across the city to monitor fill levels in real-time. A central server optimizes collection routes, dispatching trucks only when bins are near full, significantly reducing fuel consumption, operational costs, and environmental impact. The system includes a mobile app for citizens to report overfilled bins.
Team Members and Roles: Saikat Bhattacharya, Hridita Biswas, Krittika Chatterjee, Tuneer Paul, Priti Jana

Idea Description: A high-security access control system using fingerprint recognition (biometric sensor) integrated with a microcontroller (ESP32) and cloud connectivity (MQTT). The system allows or denies entry based on stored biometric data, logs all access attempts to the cloud, and can be remotely managed via a mobile application for enhanced security and monitoring.
Team Members and Roles: Ayush Agarwala, Rishav Ghatak, Gaurav Kumar, Asmita Mallick, Triparna Singha

Idea Description: A smoke and heat detection system for homes and commercial buildings. When fire is detected, it triggers an alarm, sends an alert notification via a mobile app, and automatically sprays water/fire retardant in the affected zone. The system utilizes real-time monitoring and aims for rapid response to minimize damage.
Team Members and Roles: Md Shazaan ali, Souvik paul, Dharamveer Kumar, Shubhangi Agrawal, Diganta Ghosh

Idea Description: An IoT system designed to monitor and optimize residential water usage. It tracks consumption, detects leaks instantly using flow sensors, and provides real-time data visualization on a dashboard, helping users conserve water and prevent damage from leaks.
Team Members and Roles: Sneha Debnath, Priya Bhowmik, Madhusneha Poddar, Prince Choudhary

Idea Description: An energy-efficient street lighting solution that uses PIR motion sensors and ambient light sensors. Lights automatically dim when no traffic is detected and brighten upon sensing movement, optimizing energy consumption and reducing carbon footprint while maintaining public safety.
Team Members and Roles: Tiyasa Majumdar, Ayaan Nandi, Bristi Biswas, Soham Chatterjee

Idea Title: IoT Project on RC Car with HD Video Control Over the Internet
Idea Description: The idea is to create a car controlled over the internet with live POV of the vehicle , to use a model RC car and fit it with microcontroller to control it's motors with it over internet using a PC . Possibly use Mqtt to send messages from a smartphone through a server to the microcontroller like esp32. Using a camera hat, live video can be hosted over a web server running on esp32, which can be viewed with a smartphone connected to the wifi network being broadcasted.
Team Members and Roles: Jayeeta Dey, Adarsha Chowdhury, Subhraraj Dalapati, Saptarchi Datta

Idea Description: An automated greenhouse system that monitors critical environmental factors (temperature, humidity, soil moisture, light intensity) using a network of sensors. It automatically adjusts ventilation, heating, and irrigation via actuators, ensuring optimal growing conditions for plants and maximizing crop yield with minimal manual intervention.
Team Members and Roles: Sanjhbati Mukhopadhyay, Kathakali Nath, DN Rishu, Soni Saloni, Ayush Prasad

Idea Description: This IoT project uses soil moisture and temperature sensors to monitor a plant's health. When the moisture drops below a threshold, an automated pump waters the plant. Data is displayed on a small LCD and synced to a cloud platform, allowing users to track their plant's vitals remotely.
Team Members and Roles: Debargha Saha, Biswajit Giri, Swarnendu Das, Arghyadeep Hari, Kamal

Idea Description: A comprehensive home security system integrating magnetic door sensors, PIR motion sensors, and an alarm. If a breach is detected, the system triggers a loud siren and sends instant notification alerts to the owner's smartphone via an IoT platform (e.g., Blynk or AWS IoT).
Team Members and Roles: Kritika Kumari, Ritika Roy, Aniket Kumar, Manas Singha

Idea Description: An IoT-based device that monitors electricity consumption in real-time. It provides a detailed breakdown of usage, detects anomalies to prevent energy wastage, and allows users to set consumption limits, fostering energy conservation.
Team Members and Roles: Ankita Das, Ayushi Pandey, Rounak Singh, Md Shaquib Alam, Muzafar Hossain

Idea Description: A home automation system that allows users to control appliances (lights, fans, etc.) using voice commands. The system integrates a microphone, speech recognition module, and IoT relays, providing a hands-free, intuitive interface for smart home management.
Team Members and Roles: Sayan Ghosh, Poulami Das, Debojit Chowdhury, Tandrima Chatterjee, Anmol Kumar singh

Idea Description: An all-in-one IoT system designed for parental peace of mind. It monitors the baby's vital signs, crib temperature, and movement. It also includes cry detection and sends real-time alerts to the parent's mobile device for any anomalies, such as a drop in breathing or a dangerous rise in temperature.
Team Members and Roles: Khushboo Pandey, Drishty Budhiya, Satyam Kumar, Nitish Kumar, Sundaram Kumar Roy

Idea Description: An automated medicine dispenser that uses an ESP32 microcontroller to store and dispense pills according to a pre-set schedule. It features a reminder system that alerts the user via a mobile app and sounds an alarm, significantly improving medication adherence, especially for the elderly.
Team Members and Roles: Mohit Naman, Prateek Singh, Mayank Bhushan, Risabh Jaiswal, Tamal Saha

Idea Description: Our team will create a device that can detect all kinds of mineral nutrients present in the soil along with moisture, pH and can also detect the temperature. Team Members and Roles: Arshad Ali, Abhinav kumar, Nitin kumar, Suwasika pandey

Idea Description: A safety-focused helmet integrated with IoT features, including an alcohol sensor to prevent engine ignition if the rider is impaired, a GPS module for real-time tracking, and an emergency crash sensor that sends alerts and location data to emergency contacts.
Team Members and Roles: Vishal Thakur, Anishka Bharti, Dinkar Kumar, Mouparna Hazra, Soumita Rajak

Idea Description: A secure, user-friendly hardware wallet for storing and managing cryptocurrency private keys and public addresses. Objective: - Create a tamper-proof device for secure cryptocurrency storage and transactions - Provide an intuitive interface for users to manage their cryptocurrency assets - Ensure the highest level of security and privacy for users' sensitive data
Team Members and Roles: AISHWARYA TARAFDER, TUHIN SUVRA MAJI, SUMAN BISWAS, SAYEED BIN KABIR, AREEBA ALAM

Idea Description: An IoT-based device that monitors electricity consumption in real-time. It provides a detailed breakdown of usage, detects anomalies to prevent energy wastage, and allows users to set consumption limits, fostering energy conservation.
Team Members and Roles: Lopamudra Dey, Priyam Ghosh, Souvik Saha, Sayani Maity, Samarendu Rudra

Idea Description: An energy-saving system that automatically controls room lighting. It uses an LDR sensor to measure ambient light and turns lights ON/OFF based on the room's brightness. It also uses PIR motion sensors to ensure lights are only ON when the room is occupied.
Team Members and Roles: Krishna Sen, Sayan Das, Ankush Pal, Suman Ganguly

Idea Title: Smart Home Automation and Security System
Idea Description: An integrated IoT system for comprehensive smart home management. It features environmental controls (temperature and lighting), remote appliance control, and a security layer with motion detection and door sensors, all accessible via a unified mobile interface.
Team Members and Roles: KIRTY PATEL, Ashutosh Razz, Syed Merazul Hasan, Sayan Singh, Sachin Kumar

Idea Description: An intelligent parking management system utilizing ultrasonic sensors in each parking spot to detect vehicle presence. A central display board shows the number of available slots, and a mobile app guides drivers to the nearest empty space, reducing search time and traffic congestion.
Team Members and Roles: Fauzia Khatun, Bibi Fatima Naaz, Aprajita Kumari, Harshita Gupta, Sayandeep Dey

Idea Description: Face recognition bot is an Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Computer Vision-based project that uses deep learning algorithms to identify and recognise human faces. This project uses a camera to capture images, which an AI model then processes to detect faces and match them with exist...
Team Members and Roles: Shankhadeep Das, Aditya Sharma, Ahona Roy, Ankan roy

Idea Description: This is an arduino based fingerprint doorlock prototype. In this Model, when we put our finger on the sensor the program takes an image of it and tallies it with the enrolled fingerprints. If the finger is recognized then the door automatically opens for a specific time we declared in the code and after that it close on its own.
Team Members and Roles: Divya Kumari, Aditya Kumar Poddar, Sukanta Sai, Souvik Kundu, Sarfaraj Molla

Idea Description: A drone equipped with high-resolution cameras and sensors to inspect infrastructure such as bridges, buildings, and roads for cracks and structural weaknesses. The drone captures detailed images and data, which are then analyzed using AI algorithms to identify potential issues early, ensuring timely maintenance and safety.
Team Members and Roles: Anjisnu Roy, Subhajit dutta, Soumik Sengupta, Dipanjan sahoo, Satyam kumar
